name: A Road to Ruin
description:
Welcome to Tharaal's Hollow  —  Your group of Marble-Seekers is here to get into a vault that's said to hold 2,000 Marble. As if that wouldn't be difficult enough on its own, the group is on a clicking clock as a Titan is incoming heading straight for the Tharaal's Hollow.

With all the inhabitants of Tharaal's Hollow unaware of their impending doom, Marble-Seekers can choose multiple ways to complete the adventure.

Do they save the people, or steal the money and save themselves? 

This pamphlet adventure was designed with replayability in mind. A few ways you will find variety are:

  • Dice-rolled Titan Timer that will dictate how much time a group has before the settlement is crushed under a Titan's foot.
  • Multiple Entry Points to support a variety of approach strategies
  • Tables that try to support either stealthy or combat-based runs.

Carapace was created by TorTheVic
